mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW VALUES(RSTRNT_REV_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ rNo }, #{ revCn }, SYSDATE, #{ score }, DEFAULT, #{ mNo })
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET REV_CN = #{ revCn }, REV_DATE = SYSDATE, SCORE = #{ score } WHERE REV_NO = #{ revNo }
UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET REV_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REV_NO = #{ revNo }
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE REV_NO = #{ revNo } AND REV_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT REV_NO, REV_CN, TO_CHAR(REV_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REV_DATE, SCORE, M_NO, M_ORIGIN_PF, M_STRE_PF, M_NICKNAME, M_GRAD FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(M_NO) JOIN TB_GNRL_MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE R_NO = #{restaurantId} AND REV_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REV_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE M_NO = ${memberId} AND REV_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REV_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE R_NO = #{restaurantId} AND REV_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REV_NO DESC
